line_1: How sweet when we can from Futurity borrow
line_2: HOW sweet to the heart is the thought of to-morrow,

line_1: If I thought I could readily find it, I'd borrow
line_2: My house-keeper's Bible, and read it to-morrow.

line_1: Who came on purpose, Sir, to borrow
line_2: Our Venus, for the Feast To-morrow,

line_1: He for his Oath this Salvo chose to borrow,
line_2: That he was Free, since there was no To-Morrow;
